data.name: Riddle Girl - FREE R18 DLC
data.detailed_description:
Install the free DLC for the game to unlock the adult content :)
▪ Live2D animations for all girls
▪ Constructor mode in which you can upload any image, size the puzzle, shuffle the pieces and solve it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contain content not appropriate for all ages: Nudity or Sexual Content. The characters are all over 18 years old.
